alert.note: Alert for Yavapai (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued July 28 at 6:00PM MST until July 28 at 9:00PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: The National Weather Service in Flagstaff has issued a * Flash Flood Warning for... Big Chino Wash in Yavapai County in west central Arizona... * Until 900 PM MST. * At 557 PM MST, Heavy rain that fell earlier today will flow down Big Chino Wash toward Paulden this evening. Flows are not expected to leave the banks, but several feet of water will likely move through this wash and into the Verde River tonight. HAZARD...Life-threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Life-threatening flash flooding of low-water crossings, creeks, normally dry washes and roads. * Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... mainly rural areas of Yavapai County This includes the following creeks, washes and rivers... Pine Creek, Big Chino Wash, Quartz Lead Wash, Antelope Wash, Partridge Creek, Williamson Valley Wash, Turkey Canyon, Mud Tank Wash, Walnut Creek. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
